transcript:
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan. Hello, awaz aa rahi hai. Good morning sir, Humara bol rahi hu.
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai? Chaliye.
Customer: Sir, aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aa rahi hai?
Customer: Sir, aap mujhe product ke photo bhej dete, mai add kar deti hu unko kam se kam.
Customer: Whatsapp pe?
Customer: Kaunsa product?
Executive: Acclofenac ka jo maine aapko paracetamol product ka bolna tha. Acclofenac and paracetamol tablets ka.
Customer: Dala hua hai?
Executive: Dala hua hai sir. Zero gold P ka.
Customer: Haan haan zero gold P.
Executive: Haan, uska dala hua hai lekin uski photo thik nahi hai. Maine aapko kal bola tha. Thoda sa mai sahi kar deti hu chize aur add kar de rahi hu.
Executive: Aur aur inki multiple photo bhej do aage piche ke sab jagah ke taki customer ko acche se dikhe.
Executive: Chize aur taki wo accha lage.
Customer: Whatsapp karu sir mujhe?
Customer: Mai bahar hu abhi.
Executive: Bahar ho? Kab tak aaoge sir aap ghar pe? Kisi der me aa jaoge bata do mai tab laga lungi aapko fir.
Customer: 3-4 baje ke lage.
Executive: 4 baje? Mai aapko whatsapp message dal dungi agar aap pehle pahuch jaate to bhej do. Mai chize thik kar dungi mujhe, thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with product photo update.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add/correct product photos.

- Executive asked customer to send multiple photos.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.

- Customer will send photos when he reaches home.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product photo, whatsapp, update
